attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use list_available_tools meta-tool to see what tools exist. Determine if you need a custom tool for calculating Fibonacci numbers. Set Requirements.needsCustomTool to true if fibonacci tool doesn't exist.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: If Requirements.needsCustomTool is true, use construct_tool meta-tool to create a fibonacci calculator tool with code_generation strategy. The implementation should be JavaScript code that calculates fibonacci(n). Set Requirements.toolName to the created tool name.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use the fibonacci tool (either existing or newly created) to calculate fibonacci(10). Display the result.
